channel.title: Looking for tips to reduce lag
channel.description:
hi, ever since ive gotten no-ip and my server usually has 30 people on at a time..it lags
Any tips to reduce lag or crashes please post
Also, how do i stop people from massing when pking?

item.title: Looking for tips to reduce lag
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

uhh dont spawn npc and objects while your in server cus that gives some lag… idk lol

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for tips to reduce lag
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

here are some:
1.) remove all the voids,… that you don’t need
2.) get anti lagg
3.) get anti crash
4.) get anti mass
5.) if u have spawned objects add it to case 121 (do the same with writeplayers(); remove them out of public boolean process)
6.) make sure you can’t have “null” on you server
7.) …

Read full topic
